name: Clicker Game
description:
Not much to say just a basic clicker made in Unity.

There is one version of this game that is, in fact, not broken. I have labeled it so that you know.

I made a very basic clicker game in my free time to relax.
I've spent maybe 24 hours on development.
There's still optimization and save files that can be made with this game,
however, my main goal was to make it in as little time as possible.
I hope you enjoy this, kinda bad and extremely small game.
